service.name: Calendly
service.description: Use Calendly for FREE or upgrade to one of our powerful plans. Choose the right Calendly for your team, no matter how small or large.

business_model.description: Calendly offers subscription-based plans with optional usage-based components for Enterprise services.

plans.name: Free
plans.description: For individuals starting out with basic scheduling.

other_limits.name: Event types
other_limits.description: Only one event type can be created.

other_limits.name: Calendar connections per person
other_limits.description: One calendar can be connected per user.

features.name: Unlimited 1-1 meetings
features.description: Schedule unlimited one-to-one meetings.

features.name: One event type
features.description: Create one type of event.

features.name: Connect one calendar
features.description: Connect one calendar to manage your events.

features.name: Integrate video conferencing
features.description: Integrate with video conferencing tools.

features.name: Customize your booking page
features.description: Personalize your booking page.

features.name: Send confirmation emails
features.description: Confirmation emails are sent to attendees.

features.name: Embed scheduling on your site
features.description: Embed Calendly on your website.

features.name: Mobile app & browser extension
features.description: Use Calendly on mobile devices and as a browser extension.

plans.name: Standard
plans.description: For those with more sophisticated scheduling needs.

other_limits.name: Event types
other_limits.description: Unlimited event types can be created.

other_limits.name: Calendar connections per person
other_limits.description: Up to six calendars can be connected per user.

features.name: Unlimited event types
features.description: Create unlimited event types.

features.name: Connect multiple calendars
features.description: Connect multiple calendars for broader management.

features.name: HubSpot, Mailchimp integration
features.description: Integrate with HubSpot and Mailchimp for enhanced CRM management.

features.name: Stripe, Paypal integration
features.description: Collect payments through Stripe and Paypal.

features.name: Connect with Zapier, Webhooks
features.description: Access over 700 app integrations with Zapier and webhooks.

features.name: Google Analytics integration
features.description: Track with Google Analytics.

features.name: Schedule as a team
features.description: Collaborative scheduling functionalities.

features.name: Automate reminders & more
features.description: Set up reminders and follow-up automation.

features.name: Customize Calendly
features.description: Advanced customization options.

features.name: 24/7 live chat support
features.description: Access live chat support anytime.

plans.name: Teams
plans.description: For teams who need advanced features such as reporting, meeting distribution, and automations.

other_limits.name: Event types
other_limits.description: Unlimited event types can be created.

other_limits.name: Calendar connections per person
other_limits.description: Up to six calendars can be connected per user.

features.name: Salesforce integration
features.description: Send meetings to Salesforce.

features.name: Share Round Robin meetings
features.description: Share meeting slots in round-robin fashion.

features.name: Qualify & route prospects
features.description: Features to qualify prospects and route them accordingly.

features.name: Marketo, Pardot integration
features.description: Integrations with Marketo and Pardot for marketing automation.

features.name: Advanced admin features
features.description: In-depth admin features for better control and management.

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.description: For teams who need more security, admin control, support, and enterprise-grade procurement.

other_limits.name: Event types
other_limits.description: Unlimited event types can be created.

other_limits.name: Calendar connections per person
other_limits.description: Up to six calendars can be connected per user.

features.name: Enable SSO & SAML
features.description: Security feature to simplify team access using SSO and SAML.

features.name: Domain control
features.description: Control and manage domain connections.

features.name: Route with Salesforce lookup
features.description: Route meetings via Salesforce lookup to ensure proper distribution.

features.name: Audit log compliance
features.description: Maintain compliance with audit log features.

features.name: Data deletion API
features.description: Manage data with API-controlled deletion processes.

features.name: Customer success representative
features.description: Dedicated customer success representative.

features.name: Integrate: Microsoft Dynamics
features.description: Enhanced integration with Microsoft Dynamics for CRM functionalities.

features.name: Security and legal reviews
features.description: Thorough security and legal review processes for compliance.

add_ons.name: Single Sign-On
add_ons.description: SAML-based SSO through Okta, Azure, OneLogin, Auth0.

use_cases.roi_potential: High due to time savings and customer satisfaction.

discounts.conditions: Valid for all plans except Enterprise
